Blood-Spattered Fury.name: Blood-Spattered Fury
Blood-Spattered Fury.flavor: You explode in violence, striking out and drawing your enemies’ wrath.
Blood-Spattered Fury.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Blood-Spattered Fury.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn. Until the mark ends, you and the target deal 1d10 extra damage against each other.

Ancestral Weapon's Rage.name: Ancestral Weapon's Rage
Ancestral Weapon's Rage.flavor: You strike hard, and the awesome power of the ancestors flows through you. To protect your allies, you then draw your enemies’ ire to yourself.
Ancestral Weapon's Rage.effect: You mark the target until the end of your next turn. You enter the rage of the ancestral weapon. Until the rage ends, you mark each enemy you attack until the end of your next turn. In addition, you deal 1[W] extra damage against enemies marked by you.

Ancestor's Presence.name: Ancestor's Presence
Ancestor's Presence.flavor: Calling on the spirit of an honored ancestor for aid, you focus on the destruction of a chosen foe.
Ancestor's Presence.effect: You mark the target until the end of the encounter. Whenever the target makes an attack before this mark ends, you gain a power bonus to damage rolls against it equal to your Charisma modifier. The power bonus lasts until the end of your next turn.
